description: Two explorers are rapidly melting into puddles on the floor of an ancient crypt filled with sarcophagi. One figure holds a giant burning matchstick, illuminating strange symbols inscribed on a tall, narrow object shaped like a bird's head. As they melt, one remarks on the presence of an ancient curse affecting those who defile the crypt. This scene presents a surreal and darkly humorous depiction of the immediate and literal consequences of disturbing ancient sites.
caption: "Ha! Check this out, Andrews. ... Seems there's some kind of ancient curse on those who defile this crypt."

other_text.location: On the tall object, left side
